Nov 26, 2017

Pwnable.kr - flag

In order to keep this challenge streak alive, I decide to play with another one from pwnable.kr called flag. This time our task is purely reverse enginnering, since we’re only given a binary, with no source code, no listening applications or ssh connections.

Nov 25, 2017

Pwnable.kr - bof

Another challenge from pwnable.kr will show us how to perform a simple buffer overflow attack.

Pwnable.kr - collision

Let’s start another challenge from pwnable.kr called collision, which is next one in Toddler’s Bottle category.

After feeling a big need to improve my knowledge of pwnable category, I decided to check out pwnable.kr and start from the beginning.
